title: [Large-scale] Language Therapy Practitioner Competency Enhancement Program for Cognitive Health Promotion in the Elderly

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of gerontological psychology and health management, foundational understanding of language disorder assessment and intervention
context.additional_context: Field-applicable training for practitioners in language therapy and elderly care service companies, emphasizing language-based approaches to improve communication skills in cognitively impaired elderly individuals.

learning_goals: Identify core symptom elements (pain, sleep quality, dyspnea) with 80% accuracy when assessing elderly self-cognitive health status and establish communication strategies considering linguistic expression abilities

Design and apply three or more customized health management strategies (physical activity, nutrition management) for the elderly in simulation environments, integrating tailored approaches based on the presence of language impairments

Establish practical plans for managing depression/fatigue symptoms with over 90% engagement through VR-based scenario evaluations and apply emotional support techniques utilizing verbal interactions (listening/speaking)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
